summary.para: Contains options that affect text processing.
Initializes a new instance of the OptionsSpelling class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.OptionsSpelling.CheckFromCursorPos

summary.para: Start spell check from the cursor position.

member.value: A enumeration value specifying whether the spell checker should start checking from the cursor position.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.OptionsSpelling.CheckSelectedTextFirst

para.b: Spell check the selected text first.

member.value: A enumeration value specifying whether the spell checker should start checking the selected text first.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.OptionsSpelling.IgnoreEmails

summary.para: Gets or sets whether e-mail addresses should be excluded from the check.

member.value: A enumeration value specifying whether the words which are e-mail addresses should be checked.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.OptionsSpelling.IgnoreMarkupTags

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the text enclosed with specific markup tags should be checked.

member.value: true to exclude the text within tags from the check; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.OptionsSpelling.IgnoreMixedCaseWords

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the spell checker ignores words containing different case letters in positions other than the first.

member.value: A enumeration value specifying whether the mixed case words should be checked.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.OptionsSpelling.IgnoreRepeatedWords

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the spell checker ignores repeated words.

member.value: A enumeration value specifying whether the text should be checked for repeated words.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.OptionsSpelling.IgnoreUpperCaseWords

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the spell checker ignores words in which all letters are uppercase.

member.value: A enumeration value specifying whether the words in which all letters are uppercase should be checked.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.OptionsSpelling.IgnoreUri

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the spell checker ignores strings which can be qualified as Uniform Resource Identifiers (URI).

member.value: A enumeration value specifying whether the strings which are URIs should be checked. When the IgnoreUri property is set to or , the spell checker skips URI strings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.OptionsSpelling.IgnoreUrls

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the spell checker ignores the URLs in text.

member.value: A enumeration value specifying whether the words which are URLs should be checked.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.OptionsSpelling.IgnoreWordsWithNumbers

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the spell checker ignores words that contain numbers.

member.value: A enumeration value specifying whether the words which contain numbers should be checked.

summary.para: Represents the base component of the DXSpellChecker Suite for WPF.
Initializes a new instance of the SpellChecker class with default settings.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.CanCheck(System.Windows.Controls.Control)

summary.para: Checks whether the control is registered for use with the DXSpellChecker.

member.param: A descendant, representing a control to be checked for spelling mistakes.
member.returns: true if the control is already registered by the DXSpellChecker; otherwise false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.Check(System.Windows.Controls.Control)

summary.para: Checks the specified control for spelling mistakes.

member.param: A object representing a control to be checked for spelling mistakes.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.Check(DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.Native.ISpellCheckTextControlController)

summary.para: Checks the spelling of the text available through the controller interface.

member.param: An object implementing the ISpellCheckTextController interface.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.Check(System.String)

summary.para: Checks the specified text for spelling mistakes.

member.param: A value, specifying the text to be checked for spelling mistakes.
member.returns: An asynchronous operation result, containing a value.

summary.para: Occurs when the spell check is complete.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.CheckContainer(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)

summary.para: Checks the controls within the container for spelling mistakes.

member.param: A object, representing a container which holds controls to be checked for spelling mistakes.

summary.para: Checks the spelling of the controls in the container specified for the DXSpellCkecker instance.
Occurs when the culture setting of the spell cheker is changed.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.FormsManager

summary.para: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

member.value: A SpellingFormsManager object.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.GetCommandsByError(DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.Rules.SpellCheckErrorBase)

summary.para: Creates a list of commands available to an end-user, which depend on the type of misspelling and current spell checker operation mode.

member.param: A object, representing a situation when a misspelled word is found.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.GetIgnoreList(System.Windows.Controls.Control)

summary.para: Returns the list of words ignored during spell check.

member.param: A object.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.IsChecking

summary.para: Indicates whether the current DXSpellChecker control performs a spelling check.

member.value: true if a spelling check is performed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.KeepFocusOnControl

summary.para: Specifies whether or not the input focus is set to the control that is being checked, to make the selected word visible.

member.value: true to set the input focus to the control; false to leave the input focus to the application's form.

summary.para: Occurs when the Spelling Options form used to specify the is about to be shown.
